TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit MessagingCenter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Associates a callback on subscribers with a specific message name.

remarks.para: The following shows a simple example of a strongly-typed callback using is:

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Send<TSender> (TSender sender, string message) where TSender : class;
.method public static hidebysig void Send<class TSender>(!!TSender sender, string message) cil managed

Docs.typeparam: The type of object that sends the message.
Docs.param: The instance that is sending the message. Typically, this is specified with the keyword used within the sending object.
Docs.summary: Sends a named message that has no arguments.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Send<TSender,TArgs> (TSender sender, string message, TArgs args) where TSender : class;

Docs.typeparam: The type of object that sends the message.
Docs.param: The instance that is sending the message. Typically, this is specified with the keyword used within the sending object.
Docs.summary: Sends a named message with the specified arguments.

Docs.typeparam: The type of object that sends the message.
Docs.param: The object that is subscribing to the messages. Typically, this is specified with the keyword used within the subscribing object.
Docs.summary: Run the on in response to messages that are named and that are created by .
